analysis.description:
BithubCommunityToken.startDate (/unique_chucks/7/0x9bbb30b378ed4e2b88ca0e7a066b12751affb52f.sol#102-103) is never initialized. It is used in:
	- fallback (/unique_chucks/7/0x9bbb30b378ed4e2b88ca0e7a066b12751affb52f.sol#199-210)

Detected issues with version pragma in /unique_chucks/7/0x9bbb30b378ed4e2b88ca0e7a066b12751affb52f.sol:
	- pragma solidity^0.4.18 (/unique_chucks/7/0x9bbb30b378ed4e2b88ca0e7a066b12751affb52f.sol#1): it allows old versions
Parameter '_newOwner' of Owned.transferOwnership (/unique_chucks/7/0x9bbb30b378ed4e2b88ca0e7a066b12751affb52f.sol#81) is not in mixedCase
